div.head: A Recipe for bitters
div.p: Gentian root half an ounce. Orange Peel & Lemon Peel of each one dra ⁁ c hm. Aloes Socotorine two drachms. Rhubarb two drachms put in one Quart of whiskey — Take a table spoonful every morning should it purge too severely, take less
